ValidationRule.description: When an Opportunity is lost, field Loss Detail is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Loss_Reason__c))), CloseDate>=DATE(2020,01,01), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Loss_Reason__c,"Included in Separate SOW")), ISBLANK(Loss_Detail__c) ) && $Profile.Name != "System Administrator"
